Character is the Overlord for an armada of chickens. Beware! Bwark!

Character is as quick as a demon.
With how fast this character can move, they're almost guaranteed to slip on ice.

A Shadow duplicant of another character.
Grants no experience, but drops guaranteed loot.
Character is preparing to unleash their full power.
Character is obsessed with collecting grenades. One misstep and boom!
Character is immune to losing control, either through Fear, Charm, Madness, or being turned into a chicken.
Character is immune to <font color='#FF0000'>Piercing Damage</font>.
Character is infused with a mysterious power, granting a variety of bonuses and extra skills.
Character is infused with tremendous power, granting a variety of bonuses and extra skills.
Character is persevering through sheer force of will.

Damage taken increases Rage.

At max Rage, character gains +100% critical chance and immunity to disabling statuses.

Sleeping reduces Rage.
Reflect 30% of melee damage as shadow damage
Reflect 20% of melee damage as shadow damage
Reflect 10% of melee damage as shadow damage

Character will discover hidden enemies while in combat.
Stealthed and Invisible enemies within 4m are revealed.
Becoming Drunk or disabled temporarily disables a Seeker's detection.
Character cannot discover hidden enemies while disabled/drunk.
Character can backstab with non-dagger weapons.
Character deals [ExtraData:LLENEMY_Bully_DamageMultiplier]% extra damage with direct attacks against opponents that are Slowed, Crippled or Knocked Down.
Character has a chance to counter-attack when attacked within weapon range.
Character has a [1] chance to counter-attack when attacked within weapon range.

Every time character is hit with a melee attack while wielding a shield, they perform a counterattack.
Can happen only once per turn.
Every time someone casts a Source spell in combat, character has a 20% chance of gaining a Source Point.
Character's attacks never miss but they cannot deal critical strikes.

Character has immunity to Stunned, Frozen, Knocked Down, Polymorphed, Petrified, Crippled for 1 turn after being affected by one of these statuses.
Can happen once every 3 turns.
Character is healed when standing in blood.
Character is immune to stun, and gains health when hit by <font color='#7d71d9'>Air Damage</font>.
Character has +2 Max AP, +2 Recovery AP, +30% Vitality, +30% Physical Armour, +30% Magic Armour, and doubles invested points in attributes and combat abilities.

At the start of an encounter, you gain one of two statuses: Cycle of Fire and Water or Cycle of Earth and Air. Cyle of Fire and Water increases Pyro and Hyro by 2. Cyle of Earth and Air increases Geo and Aero by 2. Statuses swap each turn.
Character must wait before they can mug again.

Character has a chance to steal a consumable item on attack.
Can only happen once per turn.
Character gains <font color='#7d71d9'>Hasted</font> when standing on electric surfaces.
Character gets 1 AP worth of free movement each turn.
Character has increased attack range of Bows and Crossbows by 2m.
Character will revive once when killed, coming back with 30% health.
Character will revive once when killed, coming back with full health.
Melee attacks deal additional fire damage to burning targets, poison damage to poisoned targets and physical damage to bleeding targets.

When an allied character dies, a Zombie Crawler is raised at their corpse, under their control. Zombie Crawler lasts 3 turns or until character is resurrected. Range 12m. Does not affect summoned creatures.
Character has the ability for certain statuses to no longer be blocked by Magic or Physical Armour, and their duration is extended by one turn.
Character will explode in a bloody cloud when killed, dealing 50% of their vitality as <font color='#9A00FF'>chaos damage</font> in a 3m radius to their enemies.
Character is immune to enviromental effects.
Character has increased recovery and maximum Action Points when their health is below 50%.

Character is empowered with random upgrades.
Empowered by the Void, character has increased resistances, Accuracy, and Dodging. Protects against Diseased, Decaying, Petrified, Stunned.

Character is empowered by madness.
When their turn ends, otherwordly tentacles lash out upon, dealing [SkillDamage:Projectile_LLENEMY_ShadowBonus_Madness_Damage] in a [ExtraData:LLENEMY_ShadowBonus_Madness_DamageRadius]m radius.
